LanguageData.BabyBorn.stages.was_born_healthy.label: {0} was born healthy
LanguageData.BabyBorn.stages.was_born_healthy.descrip: My baby brings me so much joy. I would move earth and sky for my little one.
LanguageData.FedOn.stages.fed_on_by.label: fed on by {0}
LanguageData.FedOn.stages.fed_on_by.description: I was violated by a bloodfeeder like some kind of livestock.
LanguageData.IngestedHemogenPack.stages.ingested_hemo: I ingested a hemogen pack. It might keep me alive, but it was absolutely disgusting.
LanguageData.Miscarried.stages.miscarried.label: miscarried
LanguageData.PartnerMiscarried.stages.miscarried.desc: My child's story ended before it started.
LanguageData.PregnancyEnded.stages.pregnancy_ended.de: I'm relieved I'm not pregnant any more.
LanguageData.PsychicBondTorn.stages.psychic_bond_torn: My psychic bond with {OTHERPAWN} was torn apart. I feel like part of my mind and emotions are missing.
LanguageData.Stillbirth.stages.stillbirth.label: stillbirth
LanguageData.XenogermHarvested_Prisoner.stages.genes_: They extracted my genes like I'm some sort of lab creature.
